^(catalog_name)$.description: Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

^(include_manifest_capabilities)$.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

^(max_results)$.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

^(page_token)$.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

^(schema_name_pattern)$.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for schema names. All schemas will be returned if not set or empty.

^(table_name_pattern)$.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for table names. All tables will be returned if not set or empty.

catalogName.description: Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

includeManifestCapabilities.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

pageToken.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

schemaNamePattern.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for schema names. All schemas will be returned if not set or empty.

tableNamePattern.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for table names. All tables will be returned if not set or empty.
